mapper.select: SELECT bbs_uid, reply, reg_usr, reg_dt, mod_dt, reply_seq, parent_reply_seq FROM TB_BBS_REPLY WHERE bbs_uid = #{bbs_uid} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_BBS_REPLY WHERE bbs_uid = #{bbs_uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BBS_REPLY ( reply_seq, bbs_uid, reply, parent_reply_seq, reg_usr, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_bbs_reply'), #{bbs_uid}, #{reply}, cast(#{parent_reply_seq} as integer), #{reg_usr}, now(), now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_BBS_REPLY WHERE reply_seq = CAST(#{reply_seq} as integer)
